verses.name: Acts 15:28
verses.text: For it seemed good to the Holy Ghost, and to us, to lay upon you no greater burden than these necessary things;

verses.name: Acts 15:29
verses.text: That ye abstain from meats offered to idols, and from blood, and from things strangled, and from fornication: from which if ye keep yourselves, ye shall do well. Fare ye well.

verses.name: Acts 15:30
verses.text: So when they were dismissed, they came to Antioch: and when they had gathered the multitude together, they delivered the epistle:

verses.name: Acts 15:31
verses.text: Which when they had read, they rejoiced for the consolation.
